data.name: Awesomenauts - Coco McFly Skin
data.detailed_description:
Coco has accidentally been sent back to the year 2015 by mad scientist monkey Yuri! 2015... when hoverboards had a weirdly nineteen-eighties-like design! Coco McFly must now find a way to go home in the future! Will she ever get back?

This DLC contains a custom skin for Coco Nebulon in Awesomenauts. You need to have Coco Nebulon available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
data.about_the_game:
Coco has accidentally been sent back to the year 2015 by mad scientist monkey Yuri! 2015... when hoverboards had a weirdly nineteen-eighties-like design! Coco McFly must now find a way to go home in the future! Will she ever get back?

This DLC contains a custom skin for Coco Nebulon in Awesomenauts. You need to have Coco Nebulon available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
data.short_description: Coco has accidentally been sent back to the year 2015 by mad scientist monkey Yuri! 2015... when hoverboards had a weirdly nineteen-eighties-like design! Coco McFly must now find a way to go home in the future! Will she ever get back? This DLC contains a custom skin for Coco Nebulon in Awesomenauts.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
